data.eml:eml: Two new species of the genus Khorata (Araneae: Pholcidae) from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wei, Xiao, Xu, Xiang (2014): Two new species of the genus Khorata (Araneae: Pholcidae) from China. Zootaxa 3774 (2): 183-192, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3774.2.5
